messages: @MrPope @johntdrake *opens up carefully organized accordion folder* Where should I start?
@MrPope @johntdrake *opens up carefully organized accordion folder* Where should I start?
Doing a "man on the street" bit where I'm going up and asking Super Bowl predictions. The kicker? Half of them have no idea about football.
My hypothesis is that the people who need to have the teams involved and scoring explored will do better than die-hard NFL fans.
